phases.title: Devnet
phases.summary: Fixing the final high-priority security issues. Once patched, Devnet will relaunch and unblock Public Testnet.

phases.title: Public Testnet
phases.summary: Launching after Devnet stabilizes. Early versions may be unstable until audits complete.

phases.title: Mainnet
phases.summary: Mainnet follows Testnet stability and final security competition.

notes: Major architectural changes complete (one in progress).
Every patch ships with added tests (caught 3 bugs missed in audit).
